title: Creating Ranked Team (Gold III +)
body:
**Building a ranked team**
For serious climbing but also to have a lot of fun and enjoy the game as a team :)
Im platinum V, I main jungle, so that position will usually be taken. However I can fill into any position.

_Basic requirements of joining the team are:_
- Need some form of voice communication.
- If you're toxic, you're out
- Have some kind of intelligence
But if you cover all of these things, put the following details below: 

IGN:
GENDER:
AGE:
MAIN ROLE:
MAIN CHAMPIONS:
LOCATION:
RANK:

 Thank you

replies.body: Thanks everyone, all have been added in game and we will soon have trials. However there are still two spots left. Is anyone interested?

Not sure if you need someone but I'll fill one out anyways in case a spot happens to open or someone decides to not play :)

IGN: halowenjo
GENDER: Male
AGE: 17
MAIN ROLE: 
MAIN CHAMPIONS:
LOCATION: Sydney, NSW
RANK: Plat II

I left main role / champions blank as I currently do not main a role and have been looking for one to play since I stopped playing ADC consecutively, I'm happy to fill in anywhere and am willing to practice that position as my main. I play mostly long range mid laners, tanky-engage top laners / jungler, bursty/kite ADC's and a variety of supports ranging from thresh to Annie.

IGN: Antkins
GENDER: Male
AGE: 25
MAIN ROLE: ADC (can also play mid)
MAIN CHAMPIONS: Ez, Graves, Cait, Kog (can play most ADC required)
LOCATION: Adelaide
RANK: G4

IGN:Nooodles
GENDER:Male
AGE:21
MAIN ROLE:Support
MAIN CHAMPIONS:Thresh
LOCATION:Sydney NSW
RANK:gold 1

IGN: Seethingsin
Gender: Male
Age: 22
Main role: Mid lane main 
Main champs: Azir, Cass, Ez and Yas ( but can play any mid laner to fit team comp)
Location: Sydney, Nsw
Rank: Diamond 5

I hope to speak to you soon about try outs
thank you
